metadata.title: CVE-2016-9861 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. Due to the limitation in URL matching, it was possible to bypass the URL white-list protection. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.18) are affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.5.1-1').
